column5: Last week I got a new GPS for my truck. The first thing I did was to program in the route for our trip to Red Lake. COME ON JULY.
your truck should know the way.............!
My truck knows the way but the new GPS will tell me how far it is to the next Rest Area. At my age that is a good thing to know. ;>}
just as a heads up, Never program your gps to your exact home. especially if you also have a garage door opener in your vehicle. A thief gets both and they are in your house in no time flat.
